about_dishes: What are your favourite dishes? Get inspired.
about_intro: is an app that helps you. Here you can keep a statistic of what you eat. Save your meals to make everyday life easier.
about_meals: Save your meals, what you eat and when.

about_page.lead: {{brand}} was created to help you keep track of what you eat.
about_page.lead_2: If you lack inspiration and the question
about_page.lead_3: -What are we going to eat today?
about_page.lead_4: hangs in the air you can check {{brand}}.
about_page.p1: The purpose of {{brand}} is to help you quickly and easily track what you're eating.
about_page.p2: You can then use your stored data to

click_here_to_add: Click here to add a meal

legal_page.cookie_lead: Here you will find information about what this site stores about you
legal_page.cookie_text_1: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer when you visit a website.
legal_page.cookie_text_2: This website uses cookies to remember when you log in and to store who you are.
legal_page.cookie_text_3: We also use cookies from Google to study how the website is used.
legal_page.cookie_text_4: You can change your settings and reject certain types of cookies in your browser.
legal_page.cookie_text_5: You can also delete all cookies, but remember that deleting cookies may change the way the website works.
legal_page.cookie_text_6: If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us.
